statements: SELECT * FROM SolarPanelEnergyProduction ORDER BY production_date ASC, production_time ASC
SELECT panel_id, energy_produced FROM SolarPanelEnergyProduction WHERE panel_id = 1
SELECT energy_produced, production_date FROM SolarPanelEnergyProduction WHERE energy_produced > 1000 ORDER BY energy_produced DESC
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelEnergyProduction WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT panel_id, energy_produced, production_date, production_time FROM SolarPanelEnergyProduction WHERE panel_id = 2
SELECT panel_id, energy_produced FROM SolarPanelEnergyProduction WHERE production_date = '2022-05-15' ORDER BY energy_produced DESC;
SELECT panel_id, production_date, production_time, energy_produced FROM SolarPanelEnergyProduction WHERE energy_produced > 1000 ORDER BY panel_id ASC;
SELECT SUM(energy_produced) AS total_energy_produced FROM SolarPanelEnergyProduction WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT panel_id, production_date, production_time, energy_produced FROM SolarPanelEnergyProduction WHERE production_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY production_date DESC, production_time DESC;
SELECT panel_id, production_date, production_time, energy_produced FROM SolarPanelEnergyProduction WHERE production_time BETWEEN '06:00:00' AND '18:00:00' ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelCertification
SELECT panel_id, production_date FROM SolarPanelCertification ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT panel_id, production_amount FROM SolarPanelCertification WHERE production_amount > 500 ORDER BY panel_id
SELECT * FROM CertificationAgency WHERE certification_status = 'approved'
SELECT agency_name, contact_person FROM CertificationAgency ORDER BY agency_name
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelCertification ORDER BY production_date DESC, production_time ASC;
SELECT panel_id, production_amount FROM SolarPanelCertification WHERE production_amount > 10000;
SELECT panel_id, production_date, production_amount, certification_status FROM SolarPanelCertification JOIN CertificationAgency ON SolarPanelCertification.panel_id = CertificationAgency.agency_id;

SELECT panel_id, production_time, certification_status FROM SolarPanelCertification JOIN CertificationAgency ON SolarPanelCertification.panel_id = CertificationAgency.agency_id WHERE CertificationAgency.certification_status = 'approved';
SELECT AVG(production_amount) AS average_production_amount FROM SolarPanelCertification;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels;
SELECT panel_id, panel_brand, panel_capacity FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY panel_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_amount > 1000;
SELECT panel_brand, COUNT(*) AS total_panels FROM SolarPanels GROUP BY panel_brand;
SELECT panel_brand, production_amount FROM SolarPanels INNER JOIN EnergyProduction ON SolarPanels.panel_id = EnergyProduction.panel_id;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels WHERE panel_id = 1;
SELECT panel_id, panel_brand FROM SolarPanels WHERE panel_capacity > 100;
SELECT panel_id, installation_date FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT certification_id, certification_date FROM Certification WHERE certification_result = TRUE;
SELECT production_id, production_date, production_amount FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels;
SELECT panel_location, panel_area FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_id = 1;
SELECT certification_status, certification_notes FROM certification WHERE production_id = 1;
SELECT inspector_name, inspector_email FROM inspectors WHERE inspector_id = 1;
SELECT production_kwh, production_date FROM energy_production ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inspectors;
SELECT panel_location, panel_area FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_angle > 30;

SELECT certification_id, certification_status, certification_notes FROM certification JOIN energy_production ON certification.production_id = energy_production.production_id WHERE production_kwh > 1000;
SELECT inspector_name, inspector_email FROM inspectors WHERE inspector_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT panel_id, panel_location, production_date, production_kwh FROM solar_panels JOIN energy_production ON solar_panels.panel_id = energy_production.panel_id;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelCertification;
SELECT panel_id, production_date, production_time FROM SolarPanelCertification WHERE id = 1;
SELECT energy_produced, production_date FROM SolarPanelCertification ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT panel_location, panel_capacity FROM PanelInformation WHERE panel_capacity > 200;
SELECT agency_name, contact_person FROM CertificationAgency;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelCertification ORDER BY production_date DESC, production_time ASC
SELECT panel_id, panel_location, panel_capacity FROM PanelInformation WHERE panel_capacity > 500
SELECT c.agency_name, cr.certification_date, cr.certification_result FROM CertificationAgency c INNER JOIN CertificationRecords cr ON c.agency_id = cr.agency_id
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsage WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY usage_date ASC
SELECT cr.panel_id, cr.certification_result, cr.certification_date, pi.panel_location FROM CertificationRecords cr JOIN PanelInformation pi ON cr.panel_id = pi.panel_id
